trans-unit.source: METHOD_PUT = 3 — HTTP PUT method. The PUT method asks to replace all current representations of the target resource with the request payload. (You can think of POST as “create or update” and PUT as “update”, although many services tend to not make a clear distinction or change their meaning).
trans-unit.target: METHOD_PUT = 3 -HTTP PUT方法。PUT方法要求用请求有效载荷替换目标资源的所有当前表示形式。（您可以将POST视为“创建或更新”，将PUT视为“更新”，尽管许多服务往往没有明确区分或更改其含义）。

trans-unit.source: MOUSE_FILTER_IGNORE = 2 — The control will not receive mouse button input events through _gui_input. Also the control will not receive the mouse_entered nor mouse_exited signals. This will not block other controls from receiving these events or firing the signals. Ignored events will not be handled automatically.
trans-unit.target: MOUSE_FILTER_IGNORE = 2-控件将不会通过_gui_input接收鼠标按钮输入事件。控件也不会接收mouse_entered或mouse_exited信号。这不会阻止其他控件接收这些事件或触发信号。忽略的事件将不会自动处理。

trans-unit.source: MOUSE_FILTER_IGNORE = 2 --- The control will not receive mouse button input events through _gui_input. The control will also not receive the mouse_entered nor mouse_exited signals. This will not block other controls from receiving these events or firing the signals. Ignored events will not be handled automatically.
trans-unit.target: MOUSE_FILTER_IGNORE = 2 ---控件将不会通过_gui_input接收鼠标按钮输入事件。该控件也不会接收mouse_entered或mouse_exited信号。这不会阻止其他控件接收这些事件或触发信号。忽略的事件将不会自动处理。

trans-unit.source: MOUSE_FILTER_PASS = 1 — The control will receive mouse button input events through _gui_input if clicked on. And the control will receive the mouse_entered and mouse_exited signals. If this control does not handle the event, the parent control (if any) will be considered, and so on until there is no more parent control to potentially handle it. This also allows signals to fire in other controls. Even if no control handled it at all, the event will still be handled automatically, so unhandled input will not be fired.
trans-unit.target: MOUSE_FILTER_PASS = 1 — 如果单击，控件将通过_gui_input接收鼠标按钮输入事件。并且控件将接收mouse_entered和mouse_exited信号。如果此控件不处理事件，则将考虑父控件（如果有），依此类推，直到不再有可能处理它的父控件为止。这也允许信号在其他控件中触发。即使根本没有控件处理过该事件，该事件仍将自动进行处理，因此不会触发未处理的输入。

trans-unit.source: MOUSE_FILTER_PASS = 1 --- The control will receive mouse button input events through _gui_input if clicked on. And the control will receive the mouse_entered and mouse_exited signals. If this control does not handle the event, the parent control (if any) will be considered, and so on until there is no more parent control to potentially handle it. This also allows signals to fire in other controls. Even if no control handled it at all, the event will still be handled automatically, so unhandled input will not be fired.
trans-unit.target: MOUSE_FILTER_PASS = 1 ---如果单击，控件将通过_gui_input接收鼠标按钮输入事件。并且控件将接收mouse_entered和mouse_exited信号。如果此控件未处理事件，则将考虑父控件（如果有），依此类推，直到不再有可能处理它的父控件为止。这也允许信号在其他控件中触发。即使根本没有控件处理过该事件，该事件仍将自动处理，因此不会触发未处理的输入。

trans-unit.source: MOUSE_FILTER_STOP = 0 — The control will receive mouse button input events through _gui_input if clicked on. And the control will receive the mouse_entered and mouse_exited signals. These events are automatically marked as handled and they will not propagate further to other controls. This also results in blocking signals in other controls.
trans-unit.target: MOUSE_FILTER_STOP = 0 — 如果单击，控件将通过_gui_input接收鼠标按钮输入事件。并且控件将接收mouse_entered和mouse_exited信号。这些事件会自动标记为已处理，并且不会进一步传播到其他控件。这也会导致其他控件中的信号阻塞。

trans-unit.source: MOUSE_FILTER_STOP = 0 --- The control will receive mouse button input events through _gui_input if clicked on. And the control will receive the mouse_entered and mouse_exited signals. These events are automatically marked as handled, and they will not propagate further to other controls. This also results in blocking signals in other controls.
trans-unit.target: MOUSE_FILTER_STOP = 0 ---如果单击，控件将通过_gui_input接收鼠标按钮输入事件。并且控件将接收mouse_entered和mouse_exited信号。这些事件将自动标记为已处理，并且不会进一步传播到其他控件。这也会导致其他控件中的信号阻塞。

trans-unit.source: MOUSE_MODE_CAPTURED = 2 — Captures the mouse. The mouse will be hidden and unable to leave the game window, but it will still register movement and mouse button presses. On Windows and Linux, the mouse will use raw input mode, which means the reported movement will be unaffected by the OS’ mouse acceleration settings.
trans-unit.target: MOUSE_MODE_CAPTURED = 2-捕获鼠标。鼠标将被隐藏并且无法离开游戏窗口，但仍会记录移动和按下鼠标按钮。在Windows和Linux上，鼠标将使用原始输入模式，这意味着报告的移动将不受操作系统的鼠标加速设置的影响。

trans-unit.source: MOUSE_MODE_CAPTURED = 2 --- Captures the mouse. The mouse will be hidden and its position locked at the center of the screen.
trans-unit.target: MOUSE_MODE_CAPTURED = 2 ---捕获鼠标。鼠标将被隐藏，并且其位置将锁定在屏幕中央。

trans-unit.source: Networking with nodes: After connecting to a server (or making one, see NetworkedMultiplayerENet) it is possible to use the built-in RPC (remote procedure call) system to communicate over the network. By calling rpc with a method name, it will be called locally and in all connected peers (peers = clients and the server that accepts connections). To identify which node receives the RPC call Godot will use its NodePath (make sure node names are the same on all peers). Also take a look at the high-level networking tutorial and corresponding demos.
trans-unit.target: 与节点建立网络：连接到服务器（或建立一个服务器，请参阅NetworkedMultiplayerENet）后，可以使用内置的RPC（远程过程调用）系统通过网络进行通信。通过使用方法名称调用rpc，它将在本地和所有连接的对等方（对等=客户端和接受连接的服务器）中被调用。为了确定哪个节点收到RPC调用，Godot将使用其NodePath（确保所有对等节点的节点名称都相同）。还可以看一下高级网络教程和相应的演示。

trans-unit.source: Networking with nodes: After connecting to a server (or making one, see NetworkedMultiplayerENet), it is possible to use the built-in RPC (remote procedure call) system to communicate over the network. By calling rpc with a method name, it will be called locally and in all connected peers (peers = clients and the server that accepts connections). To identify which node receives the RPC call, Godot will use its NodePath (make sure node names are the same on all peers). Also, take a look at the high-level networking tutorial and corresponding demos.
trans-unit.target: 与节点建立网络：连接到服务器（或建立一个服务器，请参阅NetworkedMultiplayerENet）后，可以使用内置的RPC（远程过程调用）系统通过网络进行通信。通过使用方法名称调用rpc，它将在本地和所有连接的对等方（对等=客户端和接受连接的服务器）中被调用。为了确定哪个节点收到了RPC调用，Godot将使用其NodePath（确保所有对等节点的节点名称都相同）。另外，请看一下高级网络教程和相应的演示。

trans-unit.source: Note: A .wav extension is automatically appended to path if it is missing.
trans-unit.target: 注：一个 .wav 扩展名会自动追加到 path 如果它缺少。

trans-unit.source: Note: A RigidBody2D will never enter sleep mode automatically if its mode is MODE_CHARACTER. It can still be put to sleep manually by setting its sleeping property to true.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果RigidBody2D的模式为MODE_CHARACTER，它将永远不会自动进入睡眠模式。通过将其sleeping属性设置为 true ,仍可以手动使其进入睡眠状态。

trans-unit.target: 注意：返回 false 的位置可能仍在相机视野之外。

trans-unit.source: Note: A singleton library cannot be reloadable.
trans-unit.target: 注意：单例库不能重新加载。

trans-unit.source: Note: Although the stream position will be set to 0, the first frame of the video stream won't become the current frame.
trans-unit.target: 注意：尽管流位置将设置为0，但视频流的第一帧不会成为当前帧。

trans-unit.source: Note: AnimatedTexture doesn't support using AtlasTextures. Each frame needs to be a separate Texture.
trans-unit.target: 注意： AnimatedTexture不支持使用AtlasTexture。每个帧都必须是一个单独的Texture。

trans-unit.source: Note: Any changes to this node's position and scale made after it enters the scene will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此节点进入场景后对其位置和比例所做的任何更改都将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Note: Arrays are always passed by reference. To get a copy of an array which can be modified independently of the original array, use duplicate.
trans-unit.target: 注意：数组始终通过引用传递。要获取可以独立于原始数组进行修改的数组副本，请使用plicate。

trans-unit.source: Note: As soon as a RichTextLabel contains at least one RichTextEffect, it will continuously process the effect unless the project is paused. This may impact battery life negatively.
trans-unit.target: 注：只要一个RichTextLabel至少包含一个 RichTextEffect ，它会持续，除非该项目被暂停过程的影响。这可能会对电池寿命产生负面影响。

trans-unit.source: Note: As this method walks through all the descendants of the node, it is the slowest way to get a reference to another node. Whenever possible, consider using get_node instead. To avoid using find_node too often, consider caching the node reference into a variable.
trans-unit.target: 注意：由于此方法遍历该节点的所有后代，因此这是获取对另一个节点的引用的最慢方法。只要有可能，请考虑改用get_node。为了避免过于频繁地使用find_node，请考虑将节点引用缓存到变量中。

trans-unit.source: Note: As this method walks upwards in the scene tree, it can be slow in large, deeply nested scene trees. Whenever possible, consider using get_node instead. To avoid using find_parent too often, consider caching the node reference into a variable.
trans-unit.target: 注意：由于此方法在场景树中向上移动，因此在大型，深度嵌套的场景树中可能会变慢。只要有可能，请考虑改用get_node。为了避免过于频繁地使用find_parent，请考虑将节点引用缓存到变量中。

trans-unit.source: Note: Assignments to bbcode_text clear the tag stack and reconstruct it from the property's contents. Any edits made to bbcode_text will erase previous edits made from other manual sources such as append_bbcode and the push_* / pop methods.
trans-unit.target: 注意：对bbcode_text的分配清除了标记栈，并从属性的内容中对其进行了重构。对bbcode_text所做的任何编辑都将删除以前从其他手动来源（例如append_bbcode和 push_* / pop方法）进行的编辑。

trans-unit.source: Note: Both the shape and the motion are supplied through a Physics2DShapeQueryParameters object. The method will return an array with two floats between 0 and 1, both representing a fraction of motion. The first is how far the shape can move without triggering a collision, and the second is the point at which a collision will occur. If no collision is detected, the returned array will be [1, 1].
trans-unit.target: 注意：形状和运动都是通过Physics2DShapeQueryParameters对象提供的。该方法将返回一个数组，其中两个浮点数介于0和1之间，这两个浮点数都表示 motion 。第一个是在不触发碰撞的情况下形状可以移动多远，第二个是发生碰撞的点。如果未检测到冲突，则返回的数组将为 [1, 1] 。

trans-unit.source: Note: Both vectors must be normalized.
trans-unit.target: 注意：两个向量都必须归一化。

trans-unit.source: Note: Breakpoints won't break on code if it's running in a thread. This is a current limitation of the GDScript debugger.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果断点在线程中运行，则断点不会中断。这是GDScript调试器的当前限制。

trans-unit.source: Note: By default, Godot can only draw up to 4,096 polygon points at a time. To increase this limit, open the Project Settings and increase ProjectSettings.rendering/limits/buffers/canvas_polygon_buffer_size_kb and ProjectSettings.rendering/limits/buffers/canvas_polygon_index_buffer_size_kb.
trans-unit.target: 注意：默认情况下，Godot一次最多只能绘制4,096个多边形点。要增加此限制，请打开“项目设置”，然后增加ProjectSettings.rendering / limits / buffers / canvas_polygon_buffer_size_kb和ProjectSettings.rendering / limits / buffers / canvas_polygon_index_buffer_size_kb。

trans-unit.source: Note: By default, this event is only emitted once per frame rendered at most. If you need more precise input reporting, call Input.set_use_accumulated_input with false to make events emitted as often as possible. If you use InputEventMouseMotion to draw lines, consider implementing Bresenham's line algorithm as well to avoid visible gaps in lines if the user is moving the mouse quickly.
trans-unit.target: 注意：默认情况下，每个渲染的帧最多仅发射一次此事件。如果需要更精确的输入报告，请使用 false 调用Input.set_use_accumulated_input以使事件尽可能频繁地发出。如果使用InputEventMouseMotion绘制线条，请考虑也实现布雷森汉姆的线条算法，以免在用户快速移动鼠标时避免出现明显的线条间隙。

trans-unit.source: Note: Changing this value will also change the user data folder's path if application/config/use_custom_user_dir is false. See Data paths in the documentation for more information.

trans-unit.source: Note: Don’t change a RigidBody’s position every frame or very often. Sporadic changes work fine, but physics runs at a different granularity (fixed hz) than usual rendering (process callback) and maybe even in a separate thread, so changing this from a process loop will yield strange behavior. If you need to directly affect the body’s state, use _integrate_forces, which allows you to directly access the physics state.
trans-unit.target: 注意：请勿每隔一帧或经常更改一次RigidBody的位置。零星的更改可以很好地工作，但是物理运行的粒度（固定的hz）与通常的渲染（过程回调）不同，甚至可能在单独的线程中运行，因此从过程循环中更改它会产生奇怪的行为。如果您需要直接影响身体的状态，请使用_integrate_forces，它使您可以直接访问物理状态。

trans-unit.source: Note: Don't change a RigidBody's position every frame or very often. Sporadic changes work fine, but physics runs at a different granularity (fixed Hz) than usual rendering (process callback) and maybe even in a separate thread, so changing this from a process loop may result in strange behavior. If you need to directly affect the body's state, use _integrate_forces, which allows you to directly access the physics state.
trans-unit.target: 注意：请勿每隔一帧或经常更改一次RigidBody的位置。零星的更改可以很好地工作，但是物理运行的粒度（固定Hz）与通常的渲染（过程回调）不同，甚至可能在单独的线程中运行，因此从过程循环中更改它可能导致奇怪的行为。如果您需要直接影响身体的状态，请使用_integrate_forces，它使您可以直接访问物理状态。

In FontForge, use File > Generate Fonts, click Options, choose the desired features then generate the font.

trans-unit.source: Note: In a boolean context, a Color will evaluate to false if it's equal to Color(0, 0, 0, 1) (opaque black). Otherwise, a Color will always evaluate to true.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在布尔型上下文中，如果 Color(0, 0, 0, 1) 等于Color（0，0，0，1 ）（不透明黑色），则Color的取值为 false 。否则，颜色将始终为 true 。

trans-unit.source: Note: In a boolean context, a Vector2 will evaluate to false if it's equal to Vector2(0, 0). Otherwise, a Vector2 will always evaluate to true.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在布尔上下文中，如果 Vector2(0, 0) 等于Vector2（0，0），则其计算结果将为 false 。否则，Vector2将始终评估为 true 。

trans-unit.source: Note: In a boolean context, a Vector3 will evaluate to false if it's equal to Vector3(0, 0, 0). Otherwise, a Vector3 will always evaluate to true.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在布尔型上下文中，如果 Vector3(0, 0, 0) 等于Vector3（0，0，0），则其结果将为 false 。否则，Vector3将始终求值为 true 。

trans-unit.source: Note: In the mathematical sense, rotation is a matrix and not a vector. The three Euler angles, which are the three independent parameters of the Euler-angle parametrization of the rotation matrix, are stored in a Vector3 data structure not because the rotation is a vector, but only because Vector3 exists as a convenient data-structure to store 3 floating-point numbers. Therefore, applying affine operations on the rotation "vector" is not meaningful.
trans-unit.target: 注意：从数学意义上讲，旋转是一个矩阵，而不是一个向量。作为旋转矩阵的欧拉角参数化的三个独立参数的三个欧拉角存储在Vector3数据结构中，不是因为旋转是矢量，而是因为Vector3作为一种方便的数据结构存在而存储3个浮点数。因此，对旋转“向量”应用仿射运算是没有意义的。

trans-unit.source: Note: Some nodes derived from this class can have a different default value, and potentially their own built-in logic overriding this setting. As such, this property can't be used in FileDialog to disable hiding the dialog when pressing OK.
trans-unit.target: 注意：派生自此类的某些节点可以具有不同的默认值，并且可能由自己的内置逻辑覆盖此设置。例如，FileDialog默认为 false ，并且具有自己的输入验证代码，当您按OK时会调用该代码，如果输入有效，最终将隐藏对话框。因此，在按“确定”时，不能在FileDialog中使用此属性来禁用隐藏对话框。

trans-unit.source: Note: The two video drivers are not drop-in replacements for each other, so a game designed for GLES3 might not work properly when falling back to GLES2. In particular, some features of the GLES3 backend are not available in GLES2. Enabling this setting also means that both ETC and ETC2 VRAM-compressed textures will be exported on Android and iOS, increasing the data pack's size.
trans-unit.target: 注意：这两个视频驱动程序不能互相替代，因此，为GLES3设计的游戏在回到GLES2时可能无法正常工作。特别是，GLES3后端的某些功能在GLES2中不可用。启用此设置还意味着ETC和ETC2 VRAM压缩的纹理都将在Android和iOS上导出，从而增加了数据包的大小。

trans-unit.source: Note: Unlike Arrays, you can't compare dictionaries directly:
trans-unit.target: 注意：与Array不同，您不能直接比较字典：

trans-unit.source: Note: Unlike Label, RichTextLabel doesn't have a property to horizontally align text to the center. Instead, enable bbcode_enabled and surround the text in a [center] tag as follows: [center]Example[/center]. There is currently no built-in way to vertically align text either, but this can be emulated by relying on anchors/containers and the fit_content_height property.
trans-unit.target: 注意：与Label不同，RichTextLabel没有用于将文本水平对齐到中心的属性。而是启用bbcode_enabled并将文本括在 [center] 标记中，如下所示： [center]Example[/center] 。当前也没有内置的方法来垂直对齐文本，但是可以通过依赖锚点/容器和fit_content_height属性来模拟。

trans-unit.source: Note: Unlike other theme overrides, there is no way to undo a color override without manually assigning the previous color.
trans-unit.target: 注意：与其他主题替代不同，如果不手动分配先前的颜色，则无法撤消颜色替代。

trans-unit.source: Note: Unlike references to a Reference, references to an Object stored in a variable can become invalid without warning. Therefore, it's recommended to use Reference for data classes instead of Object.
trans-unit.target: 注意：与对Reference的引用不同，对存储在变量中的Object的引用可能在没有警告的情况下变为无效。因此，建议对数据类使用Reference而不是 Object 。

trans-unit.source: Note: Unlike the GDScript parser, this method doesn't support the \uXXXX escape sequence.
trans-unit.target: 注意：与GDScript解析器不同，此方法不支持 \uXXXX 转义序列。

trans-unit.source: Note: Used the same as offset_h.
trans-unit.target: 注意：与offset_h相同。

trans-unit.source: Note: Users can configure it before use.
trans-unit.target: 注意：用户可以在使用前对其进行配置。

trans-unit.source: Note: Values other than Mix force the object into the transparent pipeline. See BlendMode.
trans-unit.target: 注意：“ Mix 以外的值会强制对象进入透明管道。参见BlendMode。

trans-unit.source: Note: VisibilityEnabler uses an approximate heuristic for performance reasons. It doesn't take walls and other occlusion into account. The heuristic is an implementation detail and may change in future versions. If you need precise visibility checking, use another method such as adding an Area node as a child of a Camera node and/or Vector3.dot.
trans-unit.target: 注意：出于性能原因，VisibilityEnabler使用近似试探法。它没有考虑墙壁和其他遮挡。启发式是实现细节，并且可能在将来的版本中更改。如果需要精确的可见性检查，请使用其他方法，例如将Area节点添加为Camera节点和/或Vector3.dot的子节点。

trans-unit.source: Note: VisibilityEnabler will not affect nodes added after scene initialization.
trans-unit.target: 注意： VisibilityEnabler不会影响场景初始化后添加的节点。

trans-unit.source: Note: VisibilityEnabler2D will not affect nodes added after scene initialization.
trans-unit.target: 注意： VisibilityEnabler2D不会影响场景初始化后添加的节点。

trans-unit.source: Note: VisibilityNotifier uses an approximate heuristic for performance reasons. It doesn't take walls and other occlusion into account. The heuristic is an implementation detail and may change in future versions. If you need precise visibility checking, use another method such as adding an Area node as a child of a Camera node and/or Vector3.dot.
trans-unit.target: 注意：出于性能原因，VisibilityNotifier使用近似试探法。它没有考虑墙壁和其他遮挡。启发式是实现细节，并且可能在将来的版本中更改。如果需要精确的可见性检查，请使用其他方法，例如将Area节点添加为Camera节点和/或Vector3.dot的子节点。

trans-unit.source: Note: When creating an ImageTexture, an sRGB to linear color space conversion is performed.
trans-unit.target: 注意：创建ImageTexture时，将执行sRGB到线性颜色空间的转换。

trans-unit.source: Note: When performing HTTP requests from a project exported to HTML5, keep in mind the remote server may not allow requests from foreign origins due to CORS. If you host the server in question, you should modify its backend to allow requests from foreign origins by adding the Access-Control-Allow-Origin: * HTTP header.
trans-unit.target: 注意：从导出到HTML5的项目执行HTTP请求时，请记住，由于CORS，远程服务器可能不允许来自国外的请求。如果托管有问题的服务器，则应通过添加 Access-Control-Allow-Origin: * HTTP标头来修改其后端，以允许来自国外的请求。

trans-unit.source: Note: When running a headless or server binary, this function returns an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 注意：运行无头或服务器二进制文件时，此函数返回一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Note: When using the GLES2 renderer, this is only available if the GPU supports the GL_EXT_gpu_shader4 extension.
trans-unit.target: 注意：使用GLES2渲染器时，仅在GPU支持 GL_EXT_gpu_shader4 扩展时才可用。

trans-unit.source: Note: You can also extend EditorImportPlugin if the resource type you need exists but Godot is unable to load its format. Choosing one way over another depends if the format is suitable or not for the final exported game. For example, it's better to import .png textures as .stex (StreamTexture) first, so they can be loaded with better efficiency on the graphics card.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果需要的资源类型存在，但是Godot无法加载其格式，则也可以扩展EditorImportPlugin。选择一种方式替代另一种方式取决于格式是否适合最终导出的游戏。例如，最好 .stex .png 纹理导入为.stex（StreamTexture），以便可以在图形卡上更好地加载它们。

trans-unit.source: Note: You can associate a set of normal maps by creating additional SpriteFrames resources with a _normal suffix. For example, having 2 SpriteFrames resources run and run_normal will make it so the run animation uses the normal map.
trans-unit.target: 注意：您可以通过创建带有 _normal 后缀的其他SpriteFrames资源来关联一组法线贴图。例如， run 2个SpriteFrames资源并运行 run_normal 将使其运行，以便 run 动画使用法线贴图。

trans-unit.source: Note: You can associate a set of normal maps by creating additional SpriteFrames resources with a _normal suffix. For example, having 2 SpriteFrames resources run and run_normal will make it so the run animation uses the normal map.

trans-unit.source: Note: You can only safely use RPCs on clients after you received the connected_to_server signal from the SceneTree. You also need to keep track of the connection state, either by the SceneTree signals like server_disconnected or by checking SceneTree.network_peer.get_connection_status() == CONNECTION_CONNECTED.
trans-unit.target: 注意：只有从SceneTree接收到 connected_to_server 信号后，才能在客户端上安全地使用RPC 。您还需要通过诸如 server_disconnected 之类的SceneTree信号或通过检查 SceneTree.network_peer.get_connection_status() == CONNECTION_CONNECTED 来跟踪连接状态。

trans-unit.source: Note: You cannot set this value. To change the timer's remaining time, use start.
trans-unit.target: 注意：您不能设置此值。要更改计时器的剩余时间，请使用start。

trans-unit.source: Note: You cannot use position directly, as GraphEdit is a Container.
trans-unit.target: 注意：您不能直接使用position，因为GraphEdit是Container。

trans-unit.source: Note: You must enable the AR/VR mode on the main viewport for any device that uses the main output of Godot, such as for mobile VR.
trans-unit.target: 注意：必须为使用Godot主输出的任何设备（例如移动VR）在主视口上启用AR / VR模式。

trans-unit.source: Note: You must keep a reference to channels created this way, or it will be closed.
trans-unit.target: 注意：您必须保留对以这种方式创建的通道的引用，否则它将被关闭。

trans-unit.source: Note: You must specify the certificates to be used in the Project Settings for it to work when exported.
trans-unit.target: 注意：您必须在“项目设置”中指定要使用的证书，以使其在导出时起作用。

trans-unit.source: Note: You should enable flip_v when using a TextureRect to display a ViewportTexture. Alternatively, you can enable Viewport.render_target_v_flip on the Viewport. Otherwise, the image will appear upside down.
trans-unit.target: 注意：使用TextureRect显示ViewportTexture时，应启用flip_v。或者，您可以在视口上启用Viewport.render_target_v_flip。否则，图像将倒置显示。

trans-unit.source: Note: You should hide the light if you don't want it to appear twice (dynamic and baked).
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果不想让它出现两次（动态和烘焙），则应隐藏该灯。

trans-unit.source: Note: You should not change a RigidBody2D’s position or linear_velocity every frame or even very often. If you need to directly affect the body’s state, use _integrate_forces, which allows you to directly access the physics state.
trans-unit.target: 注意：您不应该每隔一帧甚至经常更改RigidBody2D的 position 或 linear_velocity 。如果您需要直接影响身体的状态，请使用_integrate_forces，它使您可以直接访问物理状态。

trans-unit.target: 注意：这仅适用于透明对象的排序。这不会影响透明对象相对于不透明对象的排序方式。这是因为不透明的对象没有排序，而透明的对象是从后到前排序的（取决于优先级）。

trans-unit.source: Note:_ready may be called only once for each node. After removing a node from the scene tree and adding again, _ready will not be called for the second time. This can be bypassed with requesting another call with request_ready, which may be called anywhere before adding the node again.
trans-unit.target: 注意：每个节点只能对_ready调用一次。从场景树中删除节点并再次添加后，将不会第二次调用 _ready 。可以通过请求另一个具有request_ready的调用来绕过该请求，该调用可以在再次添加节点之前在任何地方调用。

trans-unit.source: PARAM_LINEAR_ORTHOGONAL_RESTITUTION = 9 — The amount of restitution when movement is across axes orthogonal to the slider.
trans-unit.target: PARAM_LINEAR_ORTHOGONAL_RESTITUTION = 9 —当移动沿与滑块正交的轴时的恢复量。

trans-unit.source: PARAM_LINEAR_ORTHOGONAL_RESTITUTION = 9 --- The amount of restitution when movement is across axes orthogonal to the slider.
trans-unit.target: PARAM_LINEAR_ORTHOGONAL_RESTITUTION = 9 ---当移动沿与滑块正交的轴时的恢复量。

trans-unit.source: PARAM_LINEAR_ORTHOGONAL_SOFTNESS = 8 — A factor applied to the movement across axes orthogonal to the slider.
trans-unit.target: PARAM_LINEAR_ORTHOGONAL_SOFTNESS = 8 —一个因子，应用于与滑块垂直的轴上的运动。

trans-unit.source: PARAM_LINEAR_ORTHOGONAL_SOFTNESS = 8 --- A factor applied to the movement across axes orthogonal to the slider.
trans-unit.target: PARAM_LINEAR_ORTHOGONAL_SOFTNESS = 8 ---应用于与滑块垂直的轴上的运动的因子。

trans-unit.source: PARAM_LINEAR_RESTITUTION = 3 — The amount of restitution on the axes movement The lower, the more momentum gets lost.
trans-unit.target: PARAM_LINEAR_RESTITUTION = 3 —轴运动恢复的量越低，失去的动量就越大。
